Service Details: - Promotes continued studies and educational interests and needs of 50+ retired and semi-retired persons in the Central Okanagan, regardless of formal education- Offers lending library of books and CDs for use by all members
How to Apply: Please visit the website for registration dates then visit the office at the Martin Centre
Cost: - Annual membership fee: $25.00- Low individual costs per course
Address & Map: The Martin Centre1434 Graham StKelowna, BC     V1Y 3A8View MapQuest Map
